title: Structured Learning Strategies to Facilitate Perceptual Change in Small-Group Learning-Resistant Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning competencies and foundational understanding of collaborative learning
context.additional_context: Project-based collaborative learning environment for job-seeking learners to strengthen language competencies, including small-group activities using digital resources in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can improve time management skills by over 20% through small-group learning strategies
Learners can generate three or more conflict resolution strategies for collaboration based on structured feedback
Learners can shift perceptions of small-group learning to over 70% positive through pre-post surveys
Learners demonstrate integrated language knowledge and application skills through project outcomes.

resources: Team Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
